description: Irregular triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = number of elements of alternating group A_n having order k, for n >= 1, 1<=k<=A051593(n).
references: J. H. Conway, R. T. Curtis, S. P. Norton, R. A. Parker and R. A. Wilson, ATLAS of Finite Groups. Oxford Univ. Press, 1985.
Koda, Tatsuhiko; Sato, Masaki; Takegahara, Yugen; 2-adic properties for the numbers of involutions in the alternating groups. J. Algebra Appl. 14 (2015), no. 4, 1550052 (21 pages).
links: Index entries for sequences related to groups
